sentences.en: A spy used cunning means to find out secrets.
sentences.cn: 间谍使用狡猾的手段获取机密.

sentences.en: All you needed was luck and cunning and boldness.
sentences.cn: 只消有点子运气、狡猾和勇敢,这样的事情便能成功.

sentences.en: Don't be fooled by any of her cunning tricks.
sentences.cn: 不要被她的任何诡计所骗.

sentences.en: Enrico was too good, an old fox, cunning.
sentences.cn: 恩里科很有心计，是一只狡猾的老狐狸。

sentences.en: He is as cunning as a fox.
He is cunning as a fox.
He tackled the job with a great deal of imagination, skill and cunning.
sentences.cn: 他在工作中充分发挥其想象力、技能和聪明才智来解决各种难题。

sentences.en: He was as cunning as a fox.
His cunning and guile were not attributes I would ever underestimate.
sentences.cn: 我从未对他的狡猾和奸诈掉以轻心。

sentences.en: Intelligence and cunning emanated from him.
sentences.cn: 他透着一种智慧和狡黠。

sentences.en: She would use low cunning (= unpleasant dishonest methods ) to win people’s sympathy.
sentences.cn: 她会耍卑鄙的花招来博得别人的同情。

sentences.en: The fox is known for its cleverness and cunning.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的机敏和狡猾是人所共知的.

sentences.en: This crew of killers and life-wreckers are headed by the mad but cunning Nino Brown.
sentences.cn: 这个残害生命的杀人团伙以疯狂而狡猾的尼诺·布朗为首。

sentences.en: You're cunning, and I can't work you out.
sentences.cn: 你这个人太狡猾, 我实在看不透你.

trans.tran_en: someone who is cunning is clever and good at deceiving people in order to get what they want
the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way
the ability to achieve what you want by deceiving people in a clever way
